Validation of distribution object

Source: R/validate.R
validate.Rd

This function conducts a comprehensive model evaluation based on either on the fitted point data or any supplied independent. Currently only supporting point. For validation of integrated models more work is needed.

# S4 method for ANY, character, sf, character, character
validate(mod, method, point, layer, point_column)

Arguments

mod

A fitted BiodiversityScenario object with set predictors
method

Should the validation be conducted on continuous metrics or thresholded? See Details.
layer

In case multiple layers exist, which one to use? Default is 'mean'
point

A sf object with type POINT or MULTIPOINT
point_column

A character vector with the name of the column containing the independent observations. Default set to 'observed'
...

passed on parameters

Value

Return a tidy tibble with validation results. See details for further information.

Details

TBD

Liu, C., White, M., Newell, G., 2013. Selecting thresholds for the prediction of species occurrence with presence-only data. J. Biogeogr. 40, 778–789. https://doi.org/10.1111/jbi.12058
